title: Check Listing Prerequisites
description:
Check if a TikTok shop is ready to list products.
Each shop needs to satisfy a series of TikTok Shop requirements before you can start listing products. Before you proceed to list products, use this API to check if your shop has satisfied all requirements.
**Tip**: We recommend that you run this check before any bulk updates to avoid listing issues. For example, sellers may change the delivery option to "Shipped by seller" but fail to add a shipping template, thus blocking the shop from listing products. In this case, the API would return `is_failed=true` for the `SHIPPING_TEMPLATE` check item and you can prompt the seller to fix the problem.
use_case: Check if a shop meets all requirements before listing products.

title: Get Categories
description:
Retrieve the list of product categories available for your shop.
Product categories are updated frequently, so it's recommended to call the API in real time to ensure you are using the latest category data. Caching category data locally may result in using outdated information, leading to errors when creating products.
**For the Indonesia market**: To list a product on both TikTok Shop and Tokopedia, you must use only categories that are available on both platforms. Please call this API twice to identify the overlapping categories.
use_case: Retrieve the latest list of available product categories for a shop.

title: Get Category Rules
description:
Retrieve the additional requirements (beyond mandatory product attributes) for listing a product in a particular category based on your shop's location. Requirements may include product certifications, size charts, dimensions and more.
Use this API to determine the supporting information that you must prepare before listing a product.
**Note**: It must be a [leaf category](6509c89d0fcef602bf1acd9b) that corresponds to the category tree type specified in the `category_version` property.
use_case: Retrieve specific listing requirements and supporting information for a product category.

title: Get Attributes
description:
Retrieve the standard built-in product and sales attributes for listing a product in a particular category based on your shop's location.
Products on TikTok Shop are grouped into categories predefined by TikTok Shop, and each category is associated with a standard set of product attributes and sales attributes.
- **Sales attributes** (e.g. size, color, length) define product variants and are optional if your product is straightforward and has no variants.
- **Product attributes** (e.g. manufacturer, country of origin, materials used) describe the product as a whole, regardless of variant. Some product attributes are mandatory based on listing policies.
Use this API to determine the mandatory and optional attributes before listing a product.
**Note**: It must be a [leaf category](6509c89d0fcef602bf1acd9b) that corresponds to the category tree type specified in the `category_version` property.
use_case: Retrieve standard product and sales attributes for a specific category.

title: Get Brands
description:
Retrieve all available brands for your shop, including the built-in brands and any custom brands created using the [Create Custom Brands API](650a0926f1fd3102b91bbfb0). Pass the returned brand ID when creating or editing a product to associate the brand with the product.
- To check if a brand is fully authorized for use in a specific product category, specify the **category ID**.
- To obtain the full list of brands that your shop can potentially use and their authorization status, omit the category ID. We recommend that you specify the **brand name** to narrow down the list of brands returned.
**Key concept**
Whether you can select and display a brand depends on the brand's authorization status, the categories authorized for the brand, and whether the brand is classified as T1 (internationally renowned brands that require prior brand authorization).
**- Brand selection rules**: You can only select the following types of brands during product creation/editing.
   - Authorized brands which contain the desired category (`authorized_status=AUTHORIZED` and `brand_status=AVAILABLE`)
   - Unauthorized non-T1 brands (`authorized_status=UNAUTHORIZED` and `is_t1_brand=false`) 
**- Brand display rules**: Note however that brands will only appear on the product display page if the brand is authorized (`authorized_status=AUTHORIZED`) and available in the desired category (`brand_status=AVAILABLE`). This means that you need to obtain brand authorization for unauthorized non-T1 brands before they can be displayed. Obtain brand authorization or add categories to an authorized brand through TikTok Shop Seller Center > Qualification Center > Brand qualification.
**For Tokopedia sellers**: You can select and display any returned brand on Tokopedia regardless of these rules.
use_case: Retrieve all available brands for the shop, including authorization status.

title: Check Product Listing
description:
Identify any issues with your product properties in advance to ensure your product is ready for listing.
Every product must meet TikTok Shop requirements before it can be listed. Before listing, you can submit all relevant product information to this API to check whether a listing meets these requirements. You'll receive a list of issues to resolve before listing. This process helps reduce the risk of failure when creating products.
**Note**: 
- The language used in the product content must align with the target market's language (e.g. don't use Chinese), otherwise the listing will fail or be rejected.
use_case: Validate product properties against listing requirements before product creation.

title: Search Size Charts
description: Retrieve size charts that a seller has created.
use_case: Retrieve existing size charts created by a seller.

title: Get Product
description: Retrieve all properties of a product, except those in the `FREEZE` or `DELETED` status.
use_case: Retrieve detailed information about a specific product.

title: Search Products
description:
Retrieve a list of products that meet the specified conditions. 
This API will only return the key product properties. You can pass a returned product ID to the [Get Product API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6509d85b4a0bb702c057fdda) to obtain more details about the product.
use_case: Search for products based on specified criteria and retrieve key properties.

title: Inventory Search
description:
Retrieve inventory information for multiple products or SKUs.
**Note**: 
- Searches can be based on either product IDs or SKU IDs, not both at the same time.
- Passing Product IDs returns the inventory information of all SKUs under the specified products.
- Passing SKU IDs returns the inventory information for the specified SKUs.
use_case: Retrieve inventory information for products or SKUs.

title: Diagnose and Optimize Product
description:
Diagnose products to obtain information that helps you to improve the product content, enhancing product visibility and customer trust. The returned information includes:
- Listing quality information (available only for the US market).
- Issues with the current product details and the overall recommendations
- Auto-generated optimization suggestions targeted for specific product fields, including the title, description, and image.
This API enables you to diagnose both live products (status: `ACTIVATE`)  and brand-new products not yet listed in TikTok Shop.
- To diagnose a **live product**, provide the `product_id` and `category_id` and leave all other product details blank.
- To diagnose a **brand-new product** not yet listed in TikTok Shop, omit the `product_id` and provide the product details as necessary.
- To diagnose a **product similar to an existing one**, provide the `product_id` and `category_id`, along with any new details. The diagnosis will combine the existing product's information with the new details you provide. For example, if you provide a new `title`, the diagnosis will use the new title instead of the existing one while keeping the other values from the product ID.
**Note**: 
- To diagnose multiple live products, use the [Product Information Issue Diagnosis API](665048f380b6b302e73917d9).
- This API focuses solely on optimizing product visibility and does not evaluate whether your product meets listing requirements. Quality issues identified by this API do not block your product from being listed. To verify listing requirements, use the [Check Product Listing API](650a0ee8f1fd3102b91c6493).
use_case: Obtain product diagnosis, quality information, and optimization suggestions.

title: Product Information Issue Diagnosis
description:
Diagnose multiple existing live (status: `ACTIVATE`) products to obtain information that helps you to improve the product content, enhancing product visibility and customer trust. The returned information includes:
- Listing quality information (available only for the US market).
- Issues with the current product details and the overall recommendations
- Auto-generated optimization suggestions targeted for specific product fields, including the title, description, and image.
**Note**: This API focuses solely on optimizing product visibility and does not evaluate whether your product meets listing requirements. Quality issues identified by this API do not block your product from being listed. To verify listing requirements, use the [Check Product Listing API](650a0ee8f1fd3102b91c6493).
use_case: Diagnose multiple live products to obtain improvement information and suggestions.

title: Get Products SEO Words
description:
Obtain SEO suggestions for product titles of live products (status: `ACTIVATE`) to enhance product visibility.
Applicable only for the US, UK, and SEA markets.
use_case: Obtain SEO suggestions for product titles.

title: Get Recommended Product Title And Description
description: Obtain AI-optimized product titles and descriptions for live products (status: `ACTIVATE`).
use_case: Obtain AI-optimized product titles and descriptions.

title: Get Image Translation Tasks
description:
Retrieves the image translation task status and translated images for one or more previously submitted images.
**Note**: Please wait 5 minutes after [task creation](684f8b2d6e0b37048b2448b4) before calling this API, and retry at intervals over 10 seconds to avoid rate limiting.
Applicable only for sellers that sell across EU.
use_case: Retrieve the status and translated images for image translation tasks.

title: Get Global Categories
description:
Retrieve all available product categories, regardless of market variations.
Product categories are updated frequently, so it's recommended to call the API in real time to ensure you are using the latest category data. Caching category data locally may result in using outdated information, leading to errors when creating global products.
use_case: Retrieve all available global product categories.

title: Recommend Global Categories
description:
Retrieve the recommended categories for a candidate global product based on its title, description, and images.
If you are syncing product catalogs from an external system to TikTok Shop, use this API to facilitate product classification.
**Note**: Double-byte characters (e.g. Chinese characters) are not supported in text fields such as descriptions and titles. If you include them, the API request will fail.
use_case: Retrieve recommended categories for a global product based on its details.

title: Get Global Category Rules
description:
Retrieve the additional requirements (beyond mandatory product attributes) for listing a global product in a particular category, regardless of market variations. Requirements may include product certifications, size charts, dimensions and more.
Use this API to determine the supporting information that you must prepare before listing a global product.
**Note**: It must be a [leaf category](650a03f8f1fd3102b91b338a) that corresponds to the category tree type specified in the `category_version` property.
use_case: Retrieve rules and requirements for listing a global product in a category.

title: Get Global Attributes
description:
Retrieve the standard built-in product and sales attributes for listing a global product in a particular category, regardless of market variations.
Products on TikTok Shop are grouped into categories predefined by TikTok Shop, and each category is associated with a standard set of product attributes and sales attributes.
- **Sales attributes** (e.g. size, color, length) define product variants and are optional if your product is straightforward and has no variants.
- **Product attributes** (e.g. manufacturer, country of origin, materials used) describe the product as a whole, regardless of variant. Some product attributes are mandatory based on listing policies.
Use this API to determine the mandatory and optional attributes before listing a global product.
**Note**: It must be a [leaf category](650a03f8f1fd3102b91b338a) that corresponds to the category tree type specified in the `category_version` property.
use_case: Retrieve standard product and sales attributes for a global product category.

title: Get Global Product
description: Retrieve all properties of a global product that is in the "DRAFT", "UNPUBLISHED", or "PUBLISHED" status, and the corresponding local product IDs in the published markets.
use_case: Retrieve detailed information about a specific global product.

title: Search Global Products
description:
Retrieve a list of global products that meet the specified conditions. 
This API will only return the key product properties. You can pass a returned global product ID to the [Get Global Product API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6509e2b0bace3e02b7490c96) to obtain more details about the product.
use_case: Retrieve a list of global products based on specified search conditions.

title: Search Manufacturers
description:
Retrieve a list of manufacturers in the EU languages supported by TikTok Shop based on their IDs or keyword.
When creating a product, pass the returned `manufacturer_id` to associate the product with the manufacturer.
Target seller: Local sellers operating in EU countries
use_case: Search for and retrieve a list of manufacturers.

title: Search Responsible Persons
description:
Retrieve a list of responsible persons in the EU languages supported by TikTok Shop based on their ID or keywords.
When creating a product, pass the returned `responsible_person_id` to associate the product with the responsible person.
Target seller: Local sellers operating in EU countries
use_case: Search for and retrieve a list of responsible persons.

title: Get Global Listing Rules
description:
Retrieves the global listing rules for a local shop that belongs to a global seller. E.g. The supported listing methods or the inventory allocation rules. The rules differ by the markets they serve.
**Note**: Applicable only for global sellers.
use_case: Retrieve global listing rules for a local shop.

title: Get Global Replicated Products
description:
Retrieves the globally associated replicas in other markets if the product has been replicated through local replication.
Applicable only for global sellers.
use_case: Retrieve globally associated replicas of a product.

title: Get Activity
description: Get the details of a product discount or flash deal promotion activity. For coupon activities, use [Get Coupon](6699dce0de15e502ed219e37).
use_case: Retrieve detailed information about a specific promotion activity.

title: Search Activities
description: Get a list of product discount or flash deal promotion activities. For coupon activities, use [Search Coupons](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6699dcdf115ebe02f841e4cd).
use_case: Retrieve a list of product discount or flash deal promotion activities.

title: Get Coupon
description: Use this API to get the full details of a coupon matching the {coupon_id}.
use_case: Retrieve detailed information about a specific coupon.

title: Search Coupons
description:
Use this API to get a list of coupons, narrowed down further based on search parameters. 
The coupons are created in Seller Center or Seller App.
For further details of the specific coupon, use `GET Coupon`.
use_case: Retrieve a filtered list of coupons.

title: Get Order List
description: Returns a list of orders created or updated during the timeframe indicated by the specified parameters. You can also apply a range of filtering criteria to narrow the list of orders returned, such as order status, delivery option type, and buyer user ID.
use_case: Retrieve a filtered list of orders.

title: Get Price Detail
description: Get the detailed pricing calculation information of an order or a line item, including vouchers, tax, etc.
use_case: Retrieve detailed pricing calculation information for an order.

title: Get External Order References
description: If you have used the `Add External Order References` API to sync order information between your external order management system (OMS) and TikTok Shop, you may call this API to get information on the synced orders.
use_case: Retrieve information on synced external order references.

title: Search Order By External Order Reference
description: If you have used the `Add External Order References` API to sync information from your external order management system (OMS) to corresponding orders in TikTok Shop, you may call this API to search for order information in TikTok Shop based on information in your OMS.
use_case: Search for TikTok Shop order information using external OMS references.

title: Get Order Detail
description: Get the detailed order information of an order, including important attributes such as order status, shipping addresses, payment details, price and tax info, and package information.
use_case: Retrieve comprehensive details of a specific order.

title: Get Order Split Attributes
description: Use this API to check whether an order(s) can be split into multiple packages or not.
use_case: Check if an order can be split into multiple packages.

title: Get Eligible Shipping Service
description: Use this API ( for US ) to query the list of available shipping services when specifying packages' size or weight. The shipping fee and delivery time is an estimate only and is based on the package dimensions and weight you provided. Options listed may differ if you change the package attributes at the time of shipping.
use_case: Query available shipping services and estimated fees/delivery times.

title: Search Package
description: Retrieve package IDs based on specified conditions. Package creation time and information update time are the common querying conditions.
use_case: Retrieve package IDs based on specified search conditions.

title: Search Combinable Packages
description: Use this API to query orders eligible for combined shipping.
use_case: Query orders eligible for combined shipping.

title: Get Package Handover Time Slots
description: Use this API to retrieve the time slots available for pickup, drop-off, or van collection for the seller's specified package by using package ID.
use_case: Retrieve available handover time slots for a specified package.

title: Get Package Shipping Document
description: For orders shipped by TikTok Shop, this API retrieves the URL of shipping documents (shipping label and packing slip) for a package specified by the package ID. This API is only applicable to "TikTok Shipping" orders. To obtain the shipping documents URL via this API, first call "Ship Package" to ship the corresponding package.
use_case: Retrieve URLs of shipping documents (labels, packing slips) for TikTok Shipped orders.

title: Get Package Detail
description: Returns information about a package, including handover time slot, tracking number, and shipping provider information.
use_case: Retrieve detailed information about a package.

title: Get Tracking
description: This API can use the order number to obtain the corresponding logistics tracking information.
use_case: Retrieve logistics tracking information for an order.

title: TTS Tracking Validation
description:
Enables a seller or warehouse to validate whether a tracking number is covered by TikTok Shipping (TTS) or Collection by TikTok (CBT). 

Available only in the **US Market**.
use_case: Validate if a tracking number is covered by TikTok Shipping.

title: Get FBT Merchant Onboarded Regions
description: This API verifies whether a seller is registered as a Fulfillment by TikTok (FBT) merchant. If the seller is onboarded, the API returns the regions where the merchant is authorized to operate under the FBT system.
use_case: Verify FBT merchant registration and retrieve authorized regions.

title: Get FBT Warehouse List
description: This API is used to retrieve all Fulfilled by TikTok warehouse information including the warehouse name, warehouse address information, etc. The IDs of subscribed warehouses can be used to query inventory-related information.
use_case: Retrieve FBT warehouse details.

title: Get Inbound Order
description: This API is used to retrieve the inbound order details including the planned inbound detail, actual inbound detail and inbound status, etc.
use_case: Retrieve FBT inbound order details.

title: Search FBT Inventory
description: This API is used to retrieve detailed inventory information for goods and matched SKUs, including sellable inventory, reserved inventory, unsellable inventory, and in-transit inventory at the warehouse level.
use_case: Search FBT inventory details.

title: Search FBT Inventory Record
description: This API is used to retrieve detailed inventory change records for goods at the warehouse level.
use_case: Search FBT inventory change records.

title: Search Goods Info
description: This API is used to retrieve a list of goods belonging to the merchant that meet the specified conditions. It returns detailed information about the goods, including their IDs, names, and other attributes, such as the goods-SKU relationship, dimensions, and weight as verified by the warehouse.
use_case: Search merchant's goods information.

title: Get Warehouse List
description: This API retrieves all warehouse information associated with the seller. Warehouse information includes name, status, address, and other details.
use_case: Retrieve seller's warehouse list.

title: Get Global Seller Warehouse
description: This API retrieves all global warehouse information associated with the seller. Warehouse information includes global warehouse ID, warehouse name, and warehouse ownership.
use_case: Retrieve seller's global warehouse list.

title: Get Warehouse Delivery Options
description: This API is used to obtain a list of delivery options available through the seller's designated warehouse.
use_case: Get delivery options for a warehouse.

title: Get Shipping Providers
description: This API is used to obtain the shipping provider corresponding to the specified delivery option
use_case: Get shipping providers for a delivery option.

title: Get Aftersale Eligibility
description: Use this API to check eligible aftersale solutions for an order, including whether the seller or buyer can initiate a refund, return, or cancel a specific order.
use_case: Check aftersale eligibility for an order.

title: Get Reject Reasons
description: Use this API to obtain order return or cancellation rejection reasons. The seller is required to provide a reason when they reject a cancel, refund, or return request.
use_case: Retrieve predefined reasons for rejecting returns or cancellations.

title: Search Returns
description: Use this API to retrieve one or more returns. This API supports filtering returns using query parameters. You can filter returns by create time, update time, return status, or return types.
use_case: Retrieve a list of return requests based on various filters.

title: Get Return Records
description: Use this API to get a list of return records.
use_case: Retrieve the history or records associated with a specific return.

title: Search Cancellations
description: Use this API to search and retrieve one or more order cancellations.
use_case: Retrieve a list of order cancellations based on search criteria.

title: Get Statements
description:
Retrieves the statements generated for a shop and the key statement information based on a specified date range or their payment status. Use this API to get an overview of your daily statements over a range of time, or to find out which statements have been paid or not. For the detailed transactions, refer to [Get Statement Transactions](650a6749defece02be67da87) or [Get Order Statement Transactions](650a6734defece02be67d724).
Applicable for all regions' sellers. Only data after 2023-07-01 is available.
use_case: Retrieve financial statements generated for a shop.

title: Get Payments
description:
**This API is currently unavailable to SEA markets.**
Retrieves records of automated payments for a shop based on a specified date range.
Use the returned list to verify and reconcile payments with the transactions in the seller's bank account.
use_case: Retrieve records of automated payments for a shop.

title: Get Withdrawals
description: Get the list of the withdrawal records (when Seller's withdraw money from TikTokShop) based on the specified date range.
use_case: Retrieve a list of withdrawal records made by a seller.

title: Get Transactions by Order
description:
Retrieves the SKU-level details of an order transaction. This covers transactions related to sales, fees, commissions, shipping, taxes, and refunds.
Applicable for all regions' sellers. Only data after 2023-07-01 is available (Please note that for US cross-border sellers, data before 2025-04-30 is unavailable).
use_case: Retrieve SKU-level transaction details for a specific order.

title: Get Transactions by Statement
description:
Retrieves the details of a statement, including the transactions, which can be a standard order transaction, an adjustment transaction, or a reserve-related transaction. For the SKU-level details of an order transaction, refer to [Get Transactions by Order](650a6734defece02be67d724).
Applicable for all regions' sellers. Only data after 2023-07-01 is available (Please note that for US cross-border sellers, data before 2025-04-30 is unavailable).
use_case: Retrieve transaction details associated with a specific statement.

title: Get Unsettled Transactions
description:
This API allows the partner to retrieve a list of unsettled transactions (incl. Orders & Adjustments) generated by a seller, returning the detailed fee breakdown for a list of order ID and adjustment ID. 
For now, this API only returns transactions which were created after 2025.01.01. Once one transaction is settled, which won't be returned by this API anymore, please get from Get Statement Transaction API. 
**Pay attention to that all data returned through this API is an estimated amount which subject to change before settlement and can only used for seller's reference, final settlement amount per each transaction can only provided through statement related API.
use_case: Retrieve a list of unsettled transactions with detailed fee breakdowns.

title: Get Shop Performance
description: Returns performance metrics at shop/seller level.
use_case: Retrieve overall performance metrics at shop/seller level.

title: Get Shop Product Performance List
description: Returns a list of product performance metrics.
use_case: Retrieve a list of product performance metrics for a shop.

title: Get Shop Product Performance
description: Returns performance metrics for a product.
use_case: Retrieve performance metrics for a specific product.

title: Get Shop SKU Performance List
description: Returns a list of SKU performance metrics.
use_case: Retrieve a list of SKU performance metrics for a shop.

title: Get Shop SKU Performance
description: Return SKU performance metrics.
use_case: Retrieve performance metrics for a specific SKU.

title: Get Shop Video Performance Overview
description: Returns overall performance metrics for all videos under a shop.
use_case: Retrieve overall performance metrics for all videos in a shop.

title: Get Shop Video Performance List
description: Returns a list of videos and associated metrics for a shop.
use_case: Retrieve a list of videos and their associated performance metrics for a shop.

title: Get Shop Video Performance Details
description: Returns detailed performance metrics for a (requested) video.
use_case: Retrieve detailed performance metrics for a specific video.

title: Get Shop Video Product Performance List
description: Returns performance metrics for a list of products promoted in a given video.
use_case: Retrieve performance metrics for products promoted in a specific video.

title: Get Shop LIVE Performance Overview
description: Returns overall performance metrics for all LIVE stream sessions under a certain shop.
use_case: Retrieve overall performance metrics for all live stream sessions in a shop.

title: Get Shop LIVE Performance List
description: Returns a list of LIVE stream sessions and associated metrics for a shop.
use_case: Retrieve a list of live stream sessions and their associated metrics for a shop.

title: Get Conversations
description: Use this API to retrieve a shop's conversations with buyers.
use_case: Retrieve a shop's conversations with buyers.

title: Get Conversation Messages
description:
Use this API to get all messages in a conversation between a buyer and a shop. 
Calling this API does not mark the messages as read. You are suggested to call [Read Message](650a59f7c16ffe02b8e8db3f) to mark the messages read.
use_case: Retrieve all messages within a specific conversation.

title: Get Agent Settings
description: This API is used to get agent settings. This API allows the agent to see whether the agent can accept chats from buyers. This API is a read-only endpoint. There will be no side effects, and can be retried safely. Note:  1. The current API version can only get settings on behalf of the shop, or the owner account holder on Seller Center. The owner in this case is acting as the customer service agent. In the future, we plan to make this API available to subaccount holders (who has customer service role) in Seller Center.  2. This API is to allow the agent to get his/her own setting.  See more information in API overview
use_case: Retrieve an agent's current settings, such as chat acceptance status.

title: Get Customer Service Performance
description: Get the average customer service performance of a shop for a selected time period
use_case: Retrieve average customer service performance metrics for a shop.

title: Get Message Templates
description: Get a library of customer engagement message templates predefined by TikTok Shop, which you can use directly in your customer engagement communications.
use_case: Retrieve a library of predefined customer engagement message templates.

title: Get Task Performances
description: Retrieve detailed performance metrics for a customer engagement task, including message reads, order conversions, and other key engagement statistics.
use_case: Retrieve detailed performance metrics for customer engagement tasks.

title: Get Feature Permissions
description: Retrieve information about customer engagement features that the shop has permission to use.
use_case: Retrieve information about customer engagement features a shop has permission to use.

title: Get Showcase Products
description: This API lists the products in the creator's showcase, paginated by specified page size and iterated through pages by page token for up to 2000 products in the showcase. This API is generally used when a creator would like to view the products in the showcase.  The platform will return the product details in the showcase, as well as the products in the livebag if the creator is live streaming.
use_case: List and view products currently in a creator's showcase.

title: Creator Search Open Collaboration Product
description:
This API is used to search the information of products with open collaboration by category, commission rate, and keywords. It will return all products on the TikTok Shop Affiliate Product Marketplace that are in an open collaboration.
Creators can only search for open collaboration within the regions they are registered in the affiliate.
use_case: Search for products with open collaboration on the TikTok Shop Affiliate Product Marketplace.

title: Search Creator Target Collaborations
description: This API is used to search for creator's target collaborations and the products within these target collaborations.
use_case: Search for a creator's target collaborations and their associated products.

title: Creator Search Sample Application Fulfillments
description: You, the creator, can use this API to query the fulfillment status for the received sample applications.
use_case: Query the fulfillment status for received sample applications.

title: Search Creator Affiliate Orders
description:
Search Creator Affiliate Orders
This API allows the partner to retrieve a list of affiliate orders generated by a creator, returning the order ID and the product ID. Using this, the partner can track their affiliate-conversions on behalf of a creator, using the order ID.
use_case: Retrieve creator affiliate orders for tracking conversions.

title: Get Creator Sample Application Detail
description: Get the sample detail of specified sample application.
use_case: Get details of a specific sample application.

title: Get Creator Applicable Sample Label
description: Check if a creator can apply for a sample of a specific product.
use_case: Check if a creator is eligible for a product sample.

title: Search Creator Sample Applications
description: Get sample application list of creator.
use_case: Get a list of creator's sample applications.

title: Creator Search Affiliate Trace Orders
description: This API allows the partner to retrieve a list of affiliate orders generated by a creator, returning the order ID and the product ID. Using this, the partner can track their affiliate-conversions on behalf of a creator, using the order ID.
use_case: Retrieve creator affiliate trace orders for tracking conversions.

title: Get Creator Profile
description: This API gets the creator profile information.
use_case: Get creator profile information.

title: Get Open Collaboration Product List By Product Ids
description: Get Product OpenCollaboration Product List By Product Ids
use_case: Get a list of open collaboration products by their IDs.

title: Get Affiliate Partner Campaign Detail
description: This API offers the ability to get affiliate campaign details.
use_case: Retrieve detailed information about a specific affiliate campaign.

title: Get Affiliate Partner Campaign List
description: This API offers the ability to list campaigns created by the Affiliate Partner.
use_case: Fetch a list of all campaigns created by an affiliate partner.

title: Get Affiliate Partner Campaign Product List
description: This API offers the ability to list products submitted by sellers in an Affiliate Partner campaign.
use_case: List all products submitted by sellers for a specific campaign.

title: Search Tap Affiliate Orders
description: TAP can use this API to retrieve a list of affiliate orders and track the affiliate conversions.
use_case: Search and retrieve a list of affiliate orders to track conversions.

title: Get Affiliate Campaign Creator Fulfillment Status List
description: This API offers the ability to get the product of the campaign fulfillment status for creators who added partner campaign products to their showcase. For details of a specified product involved in an affiliated campaign, use Get Affiliate Campaign Creator Fulfillment Status Info gateway.
use_case: Retrieve the fulfillment status for campaign products added by creators.

title: Get Affiliate Campaign Creator Fulfillment Status Info
description: This API offers the ability to get the product fulfillment status for creators who added partner campaign products to their showcase
use_case: Retrieve fulfillment status for creator products in campaigns.

title: Get Affiliate Campaign Creator Product Content Statistics
description: Get statistics on creator's marketing video content
use_case: Retrieve marketing video content statistics for creators.

title: Get Affiliate Campaign Creator Product Sample Status
description: Get progress on creator's sample status
use_case: Retrieve creator's sample progress status.

title: Seller Search Affiliate Open Collaboration Product
description:
This API is used to search the information of products with open collaboration by category, commission rate, and keywords. It will return all products on the TikTok Shop Affiliate Product Marketplace that are in an open collaboration.
Sellers can only search for open collaboration within the regions they are registered to sell in.
use_case: Search and retrieve information about open collaboration products.

title: Search Seller Affiliate Orders
description: This API allows the partner to retrieve a list of affiliate orders (orders which are affiliate-commission eligible) generated by a seller, returning the order ID and the product ID. Using this, the partner can track their affiliate-conversions on behalf of a seller, using the order ID.
use_case: Retrieve a list of affiliate-commission eligible orders for a seller.

title: Seller Search Sample Applications Fulfillments
description: You, the seller, can use this API to get the fulfillment status of the specific sample application and whether the fulfillment resulted in orders. This allows Sellers to track the current progress or analyze the results of their sample distribution program.
use_case: Retrieve fulfillment status and order results for sample applications.

title: Get Open Collaboration Sample Rules
description: Use this API to get the status and the details of the sample rules for products under an open collaboration. With this API, you can efficiently review the sample distribution criteria for products within the open collaboration context.
use_case: Retrieve status and details of sample rules for open collaboration products.

title: Get Open Collaboration Settings
description: Get the open collaboration settings, including auto add settings.
use_case: Retrieve settings for open collaborations.

title: Search Open Collaboration
description: Retrieve all open collaboration information from merchants, including commission rate, add to showcase and post content creator count.
use_case: Search and retrieve open collaboration details.

title: Get Message in the Conversation
description: Get chat history in one conversation.
use_case: Retrieve chat history for a conversation.

title: Get Conversation List
description: Get User's Conversation list.
use_case: Retrieve a list of user conversations.

title: Get Latest Unread Messages
description:
Get the unread messages from the last minute.
You are recommended to use the Webhook, New Message Listener, for the message notification.
use_case: Retrieve the latest unread messages.

title: Seller Search Creator on Marketplace
description: This API is used by Sellers to search for Creators in the Creator Marketplace. Sellers can search based on filters such as GMV, keywords, and Creator follower demographics. All the data returned is for the last 30 days.
use_case: Search and retrieve creator data based on filters.

title: Get Marketplace Creator Performance
description: Get the Creator Affiliate's Marketplace information and performance metrics in the last 30 days.
use_case: Retrieve a creator's marketplace information and performance metrics.

title: Search Target Collaborations
description: This API is used by Seller to search for all existing target collaborations. Sellers can search based on filters such as Invitation name, Invitation ID, Product name, Product ID and Creator name.
use_case: Search for existing target collaborations based on various filters.

title: Query Target Collaboration Detail
description: This API is used by Sellers to get target collaboration information.
use_case: Retrieve detailed information about a specific target collaboration.

title: Seller Search Sample Applications
description: This API is provided for sellers to query sample applications based on various criteria such as products, creators, or application statuses. By using this API, sellers can retrieve detailed information about sample application records, including the creator's information and the specifics of each application.
use_case: Query and retrieve detailed information about sample applications.

title: Get Open Collaboration Creator Content Detail
description: This API allows the seller to get the creator content details of specified open collaboration.
use_case: Retrieve creator content details for a specified open collaboration.

title: Confirm Package Shipment
description: This API enables a warehouse service provider to send package shipment information for an order. Only warehouse service providers who have been certified by the platform have permission to access this interface.
use_case: Submit package shipment details from a warehouse service provider.
